channel.title: Need help on How to make a zone a pk zone?

item.title: Need help on How to make a zone a pk zone?
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

Ok, in my public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {

There’s stuff that looks like this…

if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942) || (absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548) || (absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) || (coordY >= 9410 && coordY <= 9471 && coordX <= 2750 && coordX >= 2690)) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; }

So I want to add another area to that list so I put this…

} else if (Type == 3) { if ((coordY >= 9410) && (coordY <= 9471) && (coordX <= 2750) && (coordX >= 2690)) { return true; }

But when I go to that area u cannot attack each other… How would I do this so it will work… I will rep++ any help will be greatly welcomed.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on How to make a zone a pk zone?
